00021 #ifndef CCNDC_H
00022 #define CCNDC_H
00023 
00024 #include <ccn/charbuf.h>
00025 
00026 struct ccndc_prefix_entry;
00027 struct ccn_forwarding_entry;
00028 struct ccn_face_instance;
00029 
00030 /**
00031  * @brief Internal data structure for ccndc
00032  */
00033 struct ccndc_data
00034 {
00035     struct ccn          *ccn_handle;
00036     char                ccnd_id[32];       //id of local ccnd
00037     size_t              ccnd_id_size;
00038     int                 lifetime;
00039     struct ccn_charbuf  *local_scope_template; // scope 1 template
00040     struct ccn_charbuf  *no_name;   // an empty name
00041 };
00042 
00043 /**
00044  * @brief Initialize internal data structures
00045  * @returns "this" pointer
00046  */
00047 struct ccndc_data *
00048 ccndc_initialize_data(void);
00049 
00050 /**
00051  * @brief Destroy internal data structures
00052  * @brief data pointer to "this"
00053  */
00054 void
00055 ccndc_destroy_data(struct ccndc_data **data);
00056 
00057 /**
00058  * @brief Select a correct command based on the supplied argument
00059  * @param self          data pointer to "this"
00060  * @param check_only    flag indicating that only command checking is requested (no messages are exchanged with ccnd)
00061  * @param cmd           command name (e.g., add, del, or destroyface)
00062  * @param options       command options
00063  * @param num_options   number of command line options (not checked if < 0)
00064  * @returns 0 on success, non zero means error, -99 means command line error
00065  */
00066 int
00067 ccndc_dispatch_cmd(struct ccndc_data *self,
00068                    int check_only,
00069                    const char *cmd,
00070                    const char *options,
00071                    int num_options);
00072 
00073 
00074 /**
00075  * @brief Create a new FIB entry if it doesn't exist
00076  *
00077  * The call also automatically creates a face (if it doesn't exist)
00078  *
00079  * cmd format:
00080  *   uri (udp|tcp) host [port [flags [mcastttl [mcastif]]]])
00081  *
00082  * @param self          data pointer to "this"
00083  * @param check_only    flag indicating that only command checking is requested (nothing will be created)
00084  * @param cmd           add command without leading 'add' component
00085  * @returns 0 on success
00086  */
00087 int
00088 ccndc_add(struct ccndc_data *self,
00089           int check_only,
00090           const char *cmd);
00091 
00092 
00093 /**
00094  * @brief Delete a FIB entry if it exists
00095  *
00096  * cmd format:
00097  *   uri (udp|tcp) host [port [flags [mcastttl [mcastif]]]])
00098  *
00099  * @param self          data pointer to "this"
00100  * @param check_only    flag indicating that only command checking is requested (nothing will be removed)
00101  * @param cmd           del command without leading 'del' component
00102  * @returns 0 on success
00103  */
00104 int
00105 ccndc_del(struct ccndc_data *self,
00106           int check_only,
00107           const char *cmd);
00108 
00109 /**
00110  * @brief Delete a face and recreate it with the specified parameters and prefix
00111  *
00112  * cmd format:
00113  *   uri (udp|tcp) host [port [flags [mcastttl [mcastif]]]])
00114  *
00115  * @param self          data pointer to "this"
00116  * @param check_only    flag indicating that only command checking is requested (nothing will be created)
00117  * @param cmd           add command without leading 'renew' component
00118  * @returns 0 on success
00119  */
00120 int
00121 ccndc_renew(struct ccndc_data *self,
00122           int check_only,
00123           const char *cmd);
00124 
00125 /**
00126  * @brief Create a new face without adding any prefix to it
00127  *
00128  * cmd format:
00129  *   (udp|tcp) host [port [flags [mcastttl [mcastif]]]])
00130  *
00131  * @param self          data pointer to "this"
00132  * @param check_only    flag indicating that only command checking is requested (nothing will be created)
00133  * @param cmd           create command without leading 'create' component
00134  * @returns 0 on success
00135  */
00136 int
00137 ccndc_create(struct ccndc_data *self,
00138           int check_only,
00139           const char *cmd);
00140 
00141 
00142 /**
00143  * @brief Destroy a face
00144  *
00145  * cmd format:
00146  *   (udp|tcp) host [port [flags [mcastttl [mcastif [destroyface]]]]])
00147  *
00148  * @param self          data pointer to "this"
00149  * @param check_only    flag indicating that only command checking is requested (nothing will be removed)
00150  * @param cmd           destroy command without leading 'destroy' component
00151  * @returns 0 on success
00152  */
00153 int
00154 ccndc_destroy(struct ccndc_data *self,
00155           int check_only,
00156           const char *cmd);
00157 
00158 /**
00159  * brief Add (and if exists recreated) FIB entry based on guess from SRV records for a specified domain
00160  * @param domain        domain name
00161  * @param domain_size   size of the "domain" variable
00162  *
00163  * @returns 0 on success
00164  */
00165 int
00166 ccndc_srv(struct ccndc_data *self,
00167           const unsigned char *domain,
00168           size_t domain_size);
00169 
00170 /**
00171  * @brief Destroy face if it exists
00172  *
00173  * cmd format:
00174  *   faceid
00175  *
00176  * @param self          data pointer to "this"
00177  * @param check_only    flag indicating that only command checking is requested (nothing will be destroyed)
00178  * @param cmd           destroyface command without leading 'destroyface' component
00179  * @returns 0 on success
00180  */
00181 int
00182 ccndc_destroyface(struct ccndc_data *self,
00183                   int check_only,
00184                   const char *cmd);
00185 
00186 /**
00187  * @brief Get ID of the local CCND
00188  *
00189  * CCND ID is recorded in supplied ccndc_data data structure
00190  *
00191  * @param self          data pointer to "this"
00192  */
00193 int
00194 ccndc_get_ccnd_id(struct ccndc_data *self);
00195 
00196 /**
00197  * @brief Perform action using face management protocol
00198  * @param self          data pointer to "this"
00199  * @param action        action string
00200  * @param face_instance filled ccn_face_instance structure
00201  * @returns on success returns a new struct ccn_face_instance, describing created/destroyed face
00202  *         the structure needs to be manually destroyed
00203  */
00204 struct ccn_face_instance *
00205 ccndc_do_face_action(struct ccndc_data *self,
00206                      const char *action,
00207                      struct ccn_face_instance *face_instance);
00208 
00209 /**
00210  * @brief Perform action using prefix management protocol
00211  * @param self          data pointer to "this"
00212  * @param action        action string
00213  * @param forwarding_entry filled ccn_forwarding_entry structure
00214  * @returns 0 on success
00215  */
00216 int
00217 ccndc_do_prefix_action(struct ccndc_data *self,
00218                        const char *action,
00219                        struct ccn_forwarding_entry *forwarding_entry);
